**Note 1:** Histological examination of a regional lymphadenectomy specimen will ordinarily include 3 or more lymph nodes. If the regional lymph nodes are negative, but the number ordinarily examined is not met, classify as pN0. (1)

 **Note 2:**  Code only regional nodes and nodes, NOS, in this field.  Distant nodes are coded in M (distant metastasis).
